page.title: 13MYSELF
page.content: I get up at eight-fifteen, put my uniform on and go to school at eight forty-five. When I get to school I have the register and then do some work. After assembly we go out to play. After maths I have my dinner then play until ten minutes past one. We read silently and then its playtime. I work for about fifty minutes and then go home. When I get home I change my clothes. I pretend that my friend is in the mirror and I talk to her. I take my dog for a walk and do my spelling and sums. When I go out to play I make tents and dens and bomb them in. At five o'clock I go in for tea, like chicken pie, chips and peas with ice cream. After tea I take my dog and play with my friend again. I speak to my Mum on the phone and practise my cornet before I go to bed.
